page.title: 14INDUSTRIES
page.content: The industries below are all situated along the Shavington to Crewe Road. {EASTFIELD JOINERY}was set up jointly by two families. They employ 38 people,carrying out contract work for Cheshire C.C. and private work. {WIDDOWSON DALEBROOK ENGINEERING}is a growing family business with 140 employees. Their nuts and bolts are distributed nationally. {ASSOCIATED TYRE SPECIALISTS}is one of 462 plants throughout Britain. Set up on a garage site 12 years ago, it employs 7 people. {MR. WILKINSON}began his own car repair business 3.5 years ago. He employs 4 other people. {MORNING FOODS}employ approx. 90 and make oat products. Other industries are Crewe Coldstore, Tonks' Building Firm and Taylor's Organex.
